originalText.text: So much more than daycare, the curriculum for kids as young as 12-18 months is thoughtful, creative and fun as its lead by the interests of the children. BHWV is an incredibly special environment with some of the most patient and loving teachers. These teachers have been partners to us in the development and growth of our toddlers and have been such important parts of all their milestones. We're so grateful for their generosity, compassion and respect for our children.

originalText.text: I really cannot say enough good things about Bright Horizons West Village. The teachers and admin have gone above and beyond in so many ways. I feel lucky to have such kind, caring and creative people taking care of my child. They have made going to daycare a joy for the whole family.

text.text: I really cannot say enough good things about Bright Horizons West Village. The teachers and admin have gone above and beyond in so many ways. I feel lucky to have such kind, caring and creative people taking care of my child. They have made going to daycare a joy for the whole family.

originalText.text:
Our daughter has been going to Bright Horizon West Village for a couple of months now and it has been an amazing experience. Ellie (center director) and the teachers (in both infant and toddler class) are WONDERFUL! They are loving, caring and supportive. I trust the staff and I feel comfortable leaving my daughter there everyday.

They have been great in communicating with parents. They also use an app to keep parents updated with diaper change, food, nap and pictures/videos. It’s fun to see her interacting with teachers and other kids while doing various activities like art, story time, outdoor activities, and tons of learning and play!

Our daughter enjoys going to the center every day. She’s excited to go in when I drop her off and always happy when I pick her up. She’s grown and learnt so much! I am very happy that we chose Bright Horizon West Village.

originalText.text: Bright Horizons West Village is a wonderful center.  They take great care of my daughter and promptly respond to emails and phone calls.  In particular, we've had great experiences with Ms. Kali, Ms. Ileana and Ms. Ellie.  We're thankful to have an excellent center nearby!

text.text: Bright Horizons West Village is a wonderful center.  They take great care of my daughter and promptly respond to emails and phone calls.  In particular, we've had great experiences with Ms. Kali, Ms. Ileana and Ms. Ellie.  We're thankful to have an excellent center nearby!

originalText.text: Our son runs in with smiles and giggles every day, so excited to be at school. The staff is warm and nurturing, and the space is gorgeous - new and clean and filled with all sorts of enriching hands-on activities for the children. We actually walk a long way every day to send our son here, because the incredible staff, curriculum, and beautiful facility are far above what we've seen at any other daycare in the area.
